changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW FFF_STAGING.V_ACTIVE_STAGING_EXCEPTIONS AS WITH sf_cte (ID, SOURCE_FUNCTION) AS ( SELECT ID, COALESCE( SOURCE_FUNCTION, CONVERT(NVARCHAR(1), CASE WHEN PAYLOAD LIKE '%description%' THEN 'P' WHEN PAYLOAD LIKE '%taskrunid%' THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END) ) AS SOURCE_FUNCTION FROM FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION se )
-- Staging exceptions with no associated timeseries header record and the source function is unknown (legacy records) -- or created by the ProcessFewsEventCode function. SELECT se.* FROM FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION se INNER JOIN sf_cte ON se.ID = sf_cte.ID WHERE sf_cte.SOURCE_FUNCTION IN ('P', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_HEADER th WHERE th.TASK_RUN_ID = se.TASK_RUN_ID ) UNION -- Staging exceptions with no associated timeseries staging exception record and -- and the source function is unknown (legacy records) or created by the ImportFromFews function. SELECT se.* FROM FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION se INNER JOIN sf_cte ON se.ID = sf_cte.ID WHERE sf_cte.SOURCE_FUNCTION IN ('I', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION tse INNER JOIN FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_HEADER th ON tse.TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID = th.ID WHERE th.TASK_RUN_ID = se.TASK_RUN_ID )

rollback.sql: CREATE OR ALTER VIEW FFF_STAGING.V_ACTIVE_STAGING_EXCEPTION AS SELECT se.* FROM FFF_STAGING.STAGING_EXCEPTION se WHERE se.ACTIVE = 1
